Значения

Игла, шип, колючка, стрелка

Мнемоника

Стрелка 十, реагирующая на металл 金, компас.

Варианты

针

purpleculture_examples:
針對 [ zhēn duì ]: to target; to focus on; to be aimed at or against; in response to
針灸 [ zhēn jiǔ ]: acupuncture and moxibustion; to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 十 [ shí ] ten, tenth; complete; perfect
heisig_chinese_memo: Remember the story of the needle in the haystack. Why would someone even look for a needle if it wasn't a gold needle?
heisig_story: In frame 10 we referred ahead to this full character from which the primitive for needle (on the right) derives. Since we already expect that needles are made of metal, let us picture a set of solid gold darning needles to complete the kanji.
koohiiStory1: Remember the story of the needle in the haystack. Why would someone even look for a needle if it wasn´t a GOLD NEEDLE?
koohiiStory2: A golden needle is worth ten times more than an ordinary needle.
jp_example_words:
針路(しんろ): course, direction, compass bearing
針(はり): needle, fish hook, pointer, hand (clock)
針金(はりがね): wire
方針(ほうしん): objective, plan, policy
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: In a gold cross, you see a needle sticking out of it. The needle is right in the middle of the gold cross. If Jesus were on there, the needle would be sticking him right in the chest.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture this golden cross in your head. Why do you suppose there’s this needle stuck in it? You try to pull it out but you can’t. Envision yourself straining, trying to get the thing out.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You're about to give up on the needle when it pops out and flies directly into your shin (しん). Ouch! Now you're desperately trying to pull the needle out of your shin, but it really won't budge this time. Maybe you should have minded your own business.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine a needle sticking into your shin. It hurts a ton. How would you try to get it out?
Ru_trainchinese: zhēn: (сущ) игла, булавка; предмет в форме иглы; укол, инъекция; стежок; иглоукалывание, акупунктура
Kanshudo_mnemonic: ten (十) pieces of gold (金) make a needle
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A golden needle is better than ten normal metal ones.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " gold " to " ten " sound, the original meaning is slender and small, with a sharp end and an eye-catching sewing or stitching tool. Bei Zhou Yuxin's "Fu Zhu": "It is doubtful that the clothes in front of the lamp are bright, and it is the most difficult to feel the needle under the moon."

" Needle " can mean a needle. "The Book of Jin: The Biography of Gu Kai": "Taste the joy of a neighbor's daughter, and choose the one who is unwilling to follow. It is to shape her shape on the wall and nail her heart with thorns. The woman suffers from heartache."

" Acupuncture " also specifically refers to the treatment of acupuncture points with acupuncture in Chinese medicine. "Three Kingdoms·Weizhi·Hua Tuo Biography": "If it is moxibustion, it is only one or two places... If it is a needle, it is only one or two places."

" Needle " can also mean exhortation. Tang Yuanzhen "Tonghua": "It's not the piano that can do it alone, and there are reasons for it."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " gold " to " ten ", the original meaning is a slender and small sewing or sewing tool with a sharp end and an eye.
humanum_full_description:
從「金」，「十」聲，本義為細長而小，一頭尖銳，一頭有眼的縫紉或縫合工具。北周庾信〈對燭賦〉：「燈前桁衣疑不亮，月下穿針覺最難。」

　　「針」可表示針狀物。《晉書‧顧愷之傳》：「嘗悅一鄰女，挑之弗從，乃圖其形於壁，以棘針釘其心。女遂患心痛。」

　　「針」還特指中醫以針刺穴位以治療。《三國志‧魏志‧華陀傳》：「若當灸，不過一兩處……若當針，亦不過一兩處。」

　　「針」也可表示規勸。唐元稹〈桐花〉：「非琴獨能爾，事有諭因針。」
humanum_short_description: 從「金」，「十」聲，本義為細長而小，一頭尖銳，一頭有眼的縫紉或縫合工具。

針(はり): needle, fish hook, pointer, hand (clock)

方針(ほうしん): objective, plan, policy
從「 金 」，「 十 」聲，本義為細長而小，一頭尖銳，一頭有眼的縫紉或縫合工具。北周庾信〈對燭賦〉：「燈前桁衣疑不亮，月下穿針覺最難。」 「 針 」可表示針狀物。《晉書‧顧愷之傳》：「嘗悅一鄰女，挑之弗從，乃圖其形於壁，以棘針釘其心。女遂患心痛。」 「 針 」還特指中醫以針刺穴位以治療。《三國志‧魏志‧華陀傳》：「若當灸，不過一兩處……若當針，亦不過一兩處。」 「 針 」也可表示規勸。唐元稹〈桐花〉：「非琴獨能爾，事有諭因針。」
From " gold" to " ten" sound, the original meaning is slender and small, with a sharp end and an eye-catching sewing or stitching tool. Bei Zhou Yuxin's "Fu Zhu": "It is doubtful that the clothes in front of the lamp are bright, and it is the most difficult to feel the needle under the moon." " Needle" can mean a needle. "The Book of Jin: The Biography of Gu Kai": "Taste the joy of a neighbor's daughter, and choose the one who is unwilling to follow. It is to shape her shape on the wall and nail her heart with thorns. The woman suffers from heartache." " Acupuncture" also specifically refers to the treatment of acupuncture points with acupuncture in Chinese medicine. "Three Kingdoms·Weizhi·Hua Tuo Biography": "If it is moxibustion, it is only one or two places... If it is a needle, it is only one or two places." " Needle" can also mean exhortation. Tang Yuanzhen "Tonghua": "It's not the piano that can do it alone, and there are reasons for it."

針字的基本解释

針
zhēn
见“针”。

針字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhēn］
［《廣韻》職深切，平侵，章。］
［《廣韻》之任切，去沁，章。］
“针1”的繁体字。亦作“鍼1”。
(1)缝纫或缝合用的工具，细长而小，一头尖锐，另一头有眼用以引线。
(2)针状物。
(3)特指中医用以刺穴位以治病之针状器械。参见“針石”。
(4)用针或针状物刺。
(5)特指中医以针刺穴位以治疗。
(6)引申为治疗。
(7)规劝；讥刺。
(8)针剂，注射用的药物。

針字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　針； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1296第09
【廣韻】之林切【集韻】【正韻】諸深切，?音斟。【說文徐註】俗鍼字。所以縫也。【易·乾卦各從其類疏】若磁石引針，琥珀拾芥。【天寶遺事】唐宮中七夕結彩樓，?瓜果酒炙，祀牛女。妃嬪各執九孔針，五色線，向月穿之，過者爲得巧。　又姓。明隆慶舉人針惠。　又【方書】針灸法。互詳後鍼字註。　又蟲名。【古今注】蝌蚪，一名?針。　又書法。有垂露體，懸針體。【庾信·謝趙王啓】垂露懸針，書恩不盡。　又【廣韻】之任切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】職任切，?枕去聲。【集韻】縫也。　又刺也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhēn］
["Guangyun" deep-seated, flat invasion, chapter. ]
[Ren Qi in "Guang Yun", go to Qin, chapter. ]
Traditional characters for "针1". Also known as "Needle 1".
(1) Tools for sewing or stitching, slender and small, one end is sharp, the other end has eyes for lead.
(2) Needles.
(3) Specifically refers to needle-like instruments used in traditional Chinese medicine to prick acupoints to cure diseases. See "Needle Stone".
(4) Puncture with needles or needles.
(5) Specifically refers to the treatment of acupuncture points in traditional Chinese medicine.
(6) Extended to treatment.
(7) Advise; ridicule.
(8) Injections, drugs for injection.
needle

The concubines each hold a nine-hole needle, a five-color thread, and pass it through to the moon.　Another last name. Ming Longqing Juren Zhenhui.　[Fangshu] Acupuncture and moxibustion. Name meaning

zhēn
вм. 针
Radicals: 金, 十  (gold, cross)
Meaning Mnemonic
In a gold cross, you see a needle sticking out of it. The needle is right in the middle of the gold cross. If Jesus were on there, the needle would be sticking him right in the chest.
Picture this golden cross in your head. Why do you suppose there’s this needle stuck in it? You try to pull it out but you can’t. Envision yourself straining, trying to get the thing out.
Reading Mnemonic
You're about to give up on the needle when it pops out and flies directly into your shin (しん). Ouch! Now you're desperately trying to pull the needle out of your shin, but it really won't budge this time. Maybe you should have minded your own business.
Imagine a needle sticking into your shin. It hurts a ton. How would you try to get it out?
